import React from 'react'; import './Joul.css'; import WorkTitle from './WorkTitle/WorkTitle'; import { WorkOne, Video } from './WorkTitle/Data'; import WorkSemititle from './WorkTitle/WorkSemititle'; import {Helmet} from 'react-helmet'; import HeroSection from '../HeroSection'; import { workObjOne } from '../HomePage/Data'; import ReactPlayer from "react-player"; function Joul() { return ( <>

How might children explore about sustainability by themselves,
but not being taught?
key components
GENERATOR BLOCKS

Children can generate different types of energy such as kinetic, solar or wind energy with generator blocks.
BATTERY BLOCKS

Charged energy is storedin battery blocks and three LED lights visually quantify its charging status.
OUTPUT BLOCKS Battery blocks connect to output blocks to create different feedback such as light, sound or vibration.
MOBILE APP
); } export default Joul;
